osvSchema.details: A Time-Based SQL Injection vulnerability was discovered in Hospital Management System V4.0 which can allow an attacker to dump database information via a crafted payload entered into the 'Admin Remark' parameter under the 'Contact Us Queries -> Unread Query' tab.

description_data.value: A Time-Based SQL Injection vulnerability was discovered in Hospital Management System V4.0 which can allow an attacker to dump database information via a crafted payload entered into the 'Admin Remark' parameter under the 'Contact Us Queries -> Unread Query' tab.

descriptions.value: A Time-Based SQL Injection vulnerability was discovered in Hospital Management System V4.0 which can allow an attacker to dump database information via a crafted payload entered into the 'Admin Remark' parameter under the 'Contact Us Queries -> Unread Query' tab.

Se descubrió una vulnerabilidad de inyección SQL basada en tiempo en Hospital Management System V4.0 que puede permitir a un atacante volcar información de la base de datos a través de un payload manipulado ingresado en el parámetro 'Observación del administrador' en la pestaña 'Consultas de contacto -> Consulta no leída'.
